                # 3. å®è·µ-4åˆ›å»ºnamespace yamlæ–‡ä»¶

                #cat namespaces.yaml

--------------------------------------

root@master02:~# cd /xin-yaml/

root@master02:/xin-yaml#

NAME                   STATUS   AGE

kube-public            Active   2d20h
kube-system            Active   2d20h
kubernetes-dashboard   Active   42h
